name: .PREVIZ File Extension
summary: Learn about .PREVIZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open a PREVIZ file in FrameForge Storyboard Studio (Windows, Mac). To do so, select File â†’ Open... from the program's menu bar. Then, navigate to and open your PREVIZ file. Note that if your PREVIZ file was created on a different platform (e.g. you are a Windows user and your PREVIZ file was created on macOS), it may not open in your version of FrameForge Storyboard Studio.
